description:
In order to improve Ellee’s mood, Sora and the gang visit the Sorashido Photo Studio. Everyone enjoys the photo shoot, but on the way home a strange man in a black hooded cloak appears and takes Ellee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata na Kyoui! Ellee-chan o Torimodose!
新たな脅威! エルちゃんを取り戻せ!
